fields.name: groupSearch
fields.description: Users matching the given query sting within a particular group. Limits maximum results per request to 100. Custom order predicates are not supported at this time. For forward pagination, supply q, first, and after. For backward pagination, supply q, last, and before.

args.name: uuid
args.description: UUID of group to search within.

args.name: q
args.description: Desired query for searching Users

args.name: first
args.description: Take first n results. Should not be used in conjunction with last.

args.name: last
args.description: Take last n results. Should not be used in conjunction with first.

args.name: after
args.description: [Cursor] Get results after a given cursor from another node. Use with first.

args.name: before
args.description: [Cursor] Get results before a given cursor from another node. Use with last.

fields.deprecationReason: All group related fields are deprecated.

inputFields.name: title

inputFields.description: User profile is discoverable, or not

inputFields.description: Filepicker URL for square cropped photo

inputFields.description: Starting point of crop from left of photo, in pixels

inputFields.description: Starting point of crop from top of photo, in pixels

inputFields.description: JSON as string from FilePicker for uncropped photo

inputFields.description: JSON as string from FilePicker for square cropped photo

inputFields.description: If true, use this as profile photo

inputFields.description: If set, append photo to specified portfolio

inputFields.description: If true, use this as profile video

inputFields.name: addToPortfolioWithId
inputFields.description: If set, append video to specified portfolio

inputFields.name: socket
inputFields.description: Position from beginning (0 is beginning). This rewrites socket numbers across all placements in the portfolio.

inputFields.name: organizationId
inputFields.description: The organization that you want to affiliate interest with

inputFields.name: interested
inputFields.description: True if the user is interested, false otherwise
